name: Chao Kuo
story: Xiaobo Tong enlisted in the PLA at the age of 18 after graduating from high school in Beijing. He excelled in his training as a Recon JTAC, demonstrating remarkable aptitude for targeting and coordinating air support for ground troops during exercises. His superiors noted his exceptional organizational skills and ability to remain calm under pressure. Xiaobo is a disciplined soldier who takes his duties and responsibilities seriously. Despite his young age, he has already earned the respect of his comrades and looks forward to continued service in the army.
